data.text: @chgz227 @DocJeffD My comment stands.  There are plenty of places,  especially the closer to downtown SEA you get,  that will still require masks and vax proof.  Those will be places that are warning your $, and the places that don’t will earn mine.  I suspect you will have plenty of options.
@johnkizler @DocJeffD Please take your trolling somewhere else. This is a legitimate question for the head of infectious disease in King County.
@DocJeffD Is this an official “AMA” statement?  Why is the “I” pronoun used, instead of “We”?
@ExploringLife42 @DocJeffD I wish we could just stop with this. Protect yourself. Stop judging others. We can only heal there.
@DocJeffD @JuliaRaifman No thank you, I am good living my life
@jxchong @DocJeffD From the King County Covid dashboard https://t.co/zKW6IO1bVk

@johnkizler @DocJeffD I don't want to defund them, I want them to do their job and not be hindered by the political people running it who have a different agenda. And gtfoh with your anti mask and your thin blue line BS. 🙄

@nachthexe @DocJeffD Your risk never change, pre or post Covid. 

And the masks have no evidence of efficacy, so you have a false sense of security.

@chgz227 @DocJeffD Do understand that the vaccines don’t stop transmission and cases rose by 800% when the vax pass was implemented? 

So please share the RCT that showed they worked?
